<Text: In 1984, the International Organization for Succulent Plant Study set up a working party, now called the International Cactaceae Systematics Group, to produce a consensus classification of the cactus family, down to the level of genus.>
Triplets:<International Organization for Succulent Plant Study

Text: Taxonomy of the Cactaceae:  However, subsequent molecular phylogenetic studies have shown that a very high proportion of the higher taxa (genera, tribes and subfamilies) are not monophyletic, i.e. they do not contain all of the descendants of a common ancestor.

Triplets:<Taxonomy of the Cactaceae
